text: Lick It Up is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on September 18, 1983. == Track listing == *Exciter *Not For The Innocent *Lick It Up *Young And Wasted *Gimme More *All Hell's Breakin' Loose *A Million To One *Fits Like A Glove *Dance All Over Your Face *And On The 8th Day Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1983 albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Lick It Up
